name: Anse Lazio: The Siren's Whisper
description:
Twilight surf with glowing plankton. 3 black parrots wheel above 2 broken oars; 7 lanterns bob on the swell. Fisherman Jacques warns: 'Not all tides bring gifts.'

Riddle: "Count the wings that watch the oars that broke—sail where seven fires float."

Sophisticated painterly artwork using etched-parchment technique with Seychellois cultural motifs. Part of "The Siren's Map of Praslin" cipher series.

attributes.value: VII - The Siren's Map of Praslin

advanced_specs.render_prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card of Twilight surf with glowing plankton. 3 black parrots wheel above 2 broken oars; 7 lanterns bob on the swell. Fisherman Jacques warns: 'Not all tides bring gifts.'. twilight_surf_glowing_plankton with rough_ocean_spray_texture. Dense foliage, rhythmic Seychellois motifs, saturated greens/blues/yellows. foreground_parrots_midground_oars_background_surf. Fine copperplate hatching, visible brush strokes, textured overlays. Cultural stamps: seychellois_fisherman, traditional_lanterns. Volumetric depth, painterly effects, living busy scene. Etched-map caption strip with gold title. 17th-century nautical chart + Seychellois modernist painting, ritualistic archaeological mood.
advanced_specs.negative_prompt: flat shapes, primitive graphics, basic fills, simple geometry, vector primitives, plain colors, childlike, cartoon, modern technology, photoreal, neon, low detail
